alert.note: Alert for Fayette; Franklin; Madison; Pickaway (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 01 at 7:59PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF SOUTHWESTERN FRANKLIN, NORTHEASTERN FAYETTE, NORTHWESTERN PICKAWAY AND SOUTHEASTERN MADISON COUNTIES THROUGH 830 PM EDT... At 758 PM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was located near Mount Sterling, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 45 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Hail may cause minor damage to outdoor objects. Locations impacted include... Mount Sterling, Bloomingburg, Midway, Harrisburg, Orient, Darbyville, Deer Creek Lake, Chenoweth, Derby, Madison Mills, Darbydale, Big Plain and Pancoastburg. This includes I-71 in Ohio between mile markers 74 and 94. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...45 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a sturdy building. To report hazardous weather conditions, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely.
